import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../Settings/Settings.css' function Settings() { const [services,setServices]=useState([]) const [service,setService]=useState(null) const [activities,setActivities]=useState([]) const [activity,setActivity]=useState(null) const handleServiceName = (e)=>{ setService(e.target.value) } const addService =()=>{ setServices([...services,service]) setService(null) } const handleActivity = (e)=>{ setActivity(e.target.value) } const addActivity =()=>{ setActivities([...activities,activity]) setActivity(null) } return ( <>
Comapny Name
Industry
Address
Country
City
Postal code
Founded Date
Employees
Phone Number
Admin Number
WhatsApp Number
Email
instagram Link
FaceBook Link
Services
Add
    {services.map((option, index) => (
  • {option}
    • ))}
Activities
Add
    {activities.map((option, index) => (
  • {option}
    • ))}
) } export default Settings
